sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {Form,Button,Col} from 'react-bootstrap';

class newProject extends React.Component{

	constructor(props){
		super(props);
		this.state = {
			project : {
				owner: "",
				projectName: "",
				goal: 0,
				maxInvest: 0,
				minInvest: 0,
				description: "",
				symbol: "",
				name: "",
				decimals: 0,
				startDate: 0,
				bounsEnd: 0,
				bounsTokenToWei: 1,
				bonusTokenToWei: 0,
				endDate: 0,
				tokenToWei:0,
			}
		};
	}

	render () {
		return (
			<Form>
				<Form.Group controlId="formProjectName">
					<Form.Label>项目名称</Form.Label>
					<Form.Control  placeholder="Project name" model={this.state.projectName}/>
				</Form.Group>

				<Form.Group controlId="formGoal">
					<Form.Label>众筹金额(eth)</Form.Label>
					<Form.Control placeholder="Goal" model={this.state.project.goal}/>
				</Form.Group>
				<Form.Row>
					<Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formMaxInvest">
						<Form.Label>个人最大投资(eth)</Form.Label>
						<Form.Control placeholder="MaxInvest" model={this.state.project.maxInvest}/>
					</Form.Group>
					<Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formMinInvest">
						<Form.Label>个人最小投资(eth)</Form.Label>
						<Form.Control placeholder="MinInvest" model={this.state.project.minInvest}/>
					</Form.Group>
				</Form.Row>
				<Form.Row>
					<Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formSymbol">
						<Form.Label>众筹代币名称</Form.Label>
						<Form.Control placeholder="Symbol" model={this.state.project.symbol}/>
					</Form.Group>
					<Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formName">
						<Form.Label>众筹代币详细名称</Form.Label>
						<Form.Control placeholder="name" model={this.state.project.name}/>
					</Form.Group>
				</Form.Row>
				<Form.Group  controlId="formDecimal">
					<Form.Label>代币小数位</Form.Label>
					<Form.Control placeholder="Decimal" model={this.state.project.decimals}/>
					<Form.Text className="text-muted">默认为0(1token是否可以有小数点，)</Form.Text>
				</Form.Group>
				<Form.Group controlId="formStartDate">
					<Form.Label>开始众筹日期</Form.Label>
					<Form.Control placeholder="Start Date" />
					<Form.Text className="text-muted">不填写默认为当前时间</Form.Text>
				</Form.Group>
				<Form.Group controlId="formBounsEnd">
					<Form.Label>结束众筹奖励日期</Form.Label>
					<Form.Control placeholder="BounsEnd" />
					<Form.Text className="text-muted">不填写默认为3天后</Form.Text>
				</Form.Group>
				<Form.Group controlId="formbounsTokenToWei">
					<Form.Label>结束众筹日期</Form.Label>
					<Form.Control placeholder="End Date" model={this.state.project.bounsTokenToWei}/>
					<Form.Text className="text-muted">1eth在奖励时能购买多少token(假设你1eth能买1000token，那么你可以给在规定时间内购买token的一定的奖励。比如在2天内1eth购买1200token)</Form.Text>
				</Form.Group>
				<Form.Group controlId="formbounsTokenToWei">
					<Form.Label>奖励时间兑换价值</Form.Label>
					<Form.Control placeholder="Bouns Token to wei" model={this.state.project.bounsTokenToWei}/>
					<Form.Text className="text-muted">1token在奖励时间内需要多少wei购买(1eth=1,000,000,000,000,000,000wei)</Form.Text>
				</Form.Group>
				<Form.Group controlId="formStartDate">
					<Form.Label>1 token兑换wei</Form.Label>
					<Form.Control placeholder="Token to wei" model={this.state.project.tokenToWei}/>
					<Form.Text className="text-muted">1token需要多少wei(1eth=1,000,000,000,000,000,000wei)</Form.Text>
				</Form.Group>
				<Form.Group controlId="exampleForm.ControlTextarea1">
					<Form.Label>项目描述</Form.Label>
					<Form.Control as="textarea" rows="5" model={this.state.project.description}/>
				</Form.Group>

				<Button variant="primary" type="submit">
				Submit
				</Button>
			</Form>
		);
	}

};

export default newProject;
